data.text: @sleuth_4_truths @Doctors_NS Young children? RSV is much worse for this group. Get your head out of the sand!

@annwmac @Doctors_NS He’s the same as other Conservative premiers. Their priority is always businesses first. All of them allowed a minority of misinformed bullies to  decide what happens to the rest of us. I know we cannot live with protections forever, but dropping them all is a slap in the face.

@sleuth_4_truths @Doctors_NS I've been asking for the data that supports their decisions for pretty much since Houston became Premier. The lack of transparency really brings into question the motives. I personally think this reopening has been rushed from the original plan because he's afraid of protests.

@annwmac @Doctors_NS Here’s what happened when Demark lifted all protections and mandates, they reached the highest level of deaths during the entire pandemic. Articles mean nothing to me, unless they have evidence to support the position being pushed. https://t.co/c0mOz8rqTe

@sleuth_4_truths @Doctors_NS yea but read the article.  It's all the science. Proceeding with caution, wearing masks, being extra careful if you're an at risk.  He still very clear about the fact that Covid is still out there and that new variants are possible.
@annwmac @Doctors_NS I understand that, but the science hadn’t changed, and that is who doctors owe loyalty to.
@sleuth_4_truths @Doctors_NS He hasn't changed.  His BOSS has changed.  He advises but ultimately the decision is that of the boss.

@Doctors_NS I would like to know why the reopening has been condensed to take place in just a month. With 320 people still in hospital with Covid and hospitals still not fully operational, what logic brought us to the point where risking more infections & hospitalizations was a good thing?

@Doctors_NS My opinion of Dr. Strang has completely changed. Early in the pandemic I felt like his priority was the safety of Nova Scotians. Now, like Chief Medical Officers under Conservatives, their priority is parroting premiers.
